website_summaries.verdict: Works well with most existing basketball hoops, returning made and missed shots.
pros: The length is 9 feet and the width is 5 feet, a larger size than most basketball return systems
It's easy to set up and it's durable thanks to its polyethylene netting
It has two refillable sand bags and it's easy to store
cons: The bar that hangs below the backboard doesn't always stay level

customer_reviews.title: Works well, has a weak point
customer_reviews.text: This works well. I'm using it as a backstop instead of to bring the balls back. It prevents a lot of running around the fence to get the ball. The problem I have with it is the strap that goes over the back of the rim to hold up the net. It is very difficult to assemble, though I found that putting the hooks in both ends and then putting the pole together was easier. Also, after a year, that strap has snapped and net is hanging awkwardly. I believe this is from wear from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan T.

customer_reviews.title: Worked good, but few things to note
customer_reviews.text: Worked good, but only issues I would say: the bar that hangs below the backboard doesn’t always stay level. One side or the other will dip/raise up. It doesn’t get in the way of the game, but it looks off. Also, my kids have a habit of throwing the sand bags when putting out, or picking up, and I had one tear already. They give you 2 bags per, so I filled one bag, then double bagged it, hoping to make it thicker, and not tear again. But it funsctions well, as far as catching the ball, and either drop straight down, or slightly roll back to you.
customer_reviews.author: CAROLYN BREWER

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality where quality needed most
customer_reviews.text: Just put this Christmas gift together for use. Bungee bag that holds sand tubes ripped as I put the first one in. Doesn’t bode well for its durability as the kids move it around on the pavement. First cable tie to close tube, the head popped off. Cable ties are tiny so used my own. Will probably have to get a couple buckets to put sand in and attach bungees in no time. Could have spent another dollar or two on providing quality but chose to go cheap. The rest seems to be goo.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: definitely a manufacturing "second"
customer_reviews.text: Well, the product came on time and I didn't have any problems getting it attached to the basket, however, it is definitely a manufacturing 'second'. It claims it is 10ft wide at the bottom, true, it is, however, it is horribly lopsided. It is at least 18 inches longer on the left hand side vs. the right hand side. It is so lopsided that I ended up just folding the extra 18" underneath the sandbag so at least it was usable. This was about 2/3 the price of the more expensive versions, so you get what you pay for. Beware, don't order this.
customer_reviews.author: dara

customer_reviews.title: Nice deal
customer_reviews.text: Nice item for our half court; I purchased to protect my flowers from the balls however my kids really like that it returns the ball. Great buy for the price .. only issue is the refillable sand bags are cheap and burst the first month of use. Easy fix but would have like it to last a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: DianeS9

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted an inexpensive net to keep the beasketball out of our kids play area. This net was reasonably easy to set up and works very well. We chose to use bungee cords up and down the sides of the net to increase the effective blocking range of the net.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk or Jen G.

customer_reviews.title: The brackets slip on very easily, but it tends to hang sideways on the ...
customer_reviews.text: The brackets slip on very easily, but it tends to hang sideways on the backboard. I use it on the hoop by our pool and it has helped to limit the times my children are in and out of the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Tim T.

customer_reviews.title: Ballin!
customer_reviews.text: In terms of functionality, perfect! All those people complaining about assembly being too hard must have a 4 year old putting it together... oh wait, my 4 yo just helped hook the clips to the pole. You can do it put yo back into it! Not sure about durability, but enjoying not having to worry about broken windows and retrieving stray balls.
customer_reviews.author: J Pak

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality net
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality net. It solved our problem of the balls bouncing down into the woods by our house. Recommended it to a friend and she purchased one for her son as well. Great net for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MotorSitty

customer_reviews.title: Sand bags
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of complaints about the sand bags, they are basically small black trash bags. It didn’t take me long to figure out if I got sand bags at the local home improvement store ($0.53) each and put them in the mesh bags before you fill them up that problem is solved. The only reason this isn’t a 5 star is for that reason, shouldn’t have to finish engineering for them.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Umm
customer_reviews.text: Great if the ball doesn't hit the side of the rim
customer_reviews.author: peter miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Sturdy. Great for keeping kids from running into the road to chase a ball.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D Miller

customer_reviews.title: Family fun for hours
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Strong material. Kids use it to hook to pool to play basketball and have the ball tun back to the pool. Fun times
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rominyk

customer_reviews.title: The grabdkids being novice bb players I realized we needed this and they love it, too (not having to climb up the ...
customer_reviews.text: Our basketball hoop is infront of our retaining wall that has numerous herbs growing. The grabdkids being novice bb players I realized we needed this and they love it, too (not having to climb up the wall to get to the ball)
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn's corner

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job
customer_reviews.text: Tough to keep secured in high wind but so far durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved this product. It was on his wishlist for Christmas. He was very happy when he opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Net
customer_reviews.text: The net stops the ball but the balls doesn’t roll back to the shooter. The net is nice cause you don’t have to chase the ball
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Had the same problem with the metal bar being too ...
customer_reviews.text: Had the same problem with the metal bar being too long. My husband had to cut it to fit the harness. It is a pity that the manufacturer continued to sell defect product online. Without the defect, it could be a 4 star item.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy W

customer_reviews.title: Overall good - sand bag holders not durable
customer_reviews.text: The bags that hold sand-filled bags are poor quality mesh that rip easily, particularly after some exposure to weather.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Works Every Time
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly and it's so easy to set up if you want to use the net to your timing Advantage then this is it... Bring the ball back to you at your feet
customer_reviews.author: Brent Mulkey

customer_reviews.title: takes up room
customer_reviews.text: Simply a ball return. Sand bags don't hold up, but net does. Easy to install. Layups may not be possible with this in place.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Anchors broke within a week of use.
customer_reviews.text: The mesh bags and straps for the anchors broke after a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Erin G.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have gotten the more expensive model but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl knox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great for keeping the basketball out of the garden
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgang Schwurack

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The bar at the top is to long. I trying to look for answers besides cutting it
customer_reviews.author: MINDY

customer_reviews.title: Great ball return
customer_reviews.text: Every made free throw comes right back to your feet. Also most misses.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Richards

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service at Rolbak not very responsive and disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Works great after jimmy-rig adjustment. Net harness too short to fit in tube. had to find carabiner to make it work. kept calling customer service who said someone would call me and never did, even after i called back 2-3 times. with jimmy-rig, it doesn't look the greatest but it works.
customer_reviews.author: rparedes1

customer_reviews.title: No more chasing balls.
customer_reviews.text: Our hoope is at the top of a large hill, so we had to do something. This was the cheapest option and does work. We did not set up the net like in the photo. Were can you buy just net would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Coexist

customer_reviews.title: My kids were disappointed but I decided to return the product
customer_reviews.text: The harness strap was too short to fit into the bars which I found on another review as well. My kids were disappointed but I decided to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Santosh C. Patel

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Came on time, all parts in box, easy to put together, and it helps to keep balls from running to the mailbox. Easy to adjust as well.
customer_reviews.author: J&R

customer_reviews.title: Great for basketball in the pool.
customer_reviews.text: We really like the next. When our pile broke to the old basketball goal we buried it by the shallow end of the pool so we could play bball in the pool. Net keeps ball coming back, even when we miss the goal. The only problem we had was that the sand bags kept busting, fortunately they weren't I the pool when they busted. The packaging as literally comical, when my son was opening the item. First he opened a really big box with a lot of packaging and a smaller box, opened that box to find a smaller box, opened that box and finally found the box with the item in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kdmmom

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The sand bags ar not strong enough and have already ripped open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: Came right away and were as advertised. Pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pay no mind to the other bad reviews
customer_reviews.text: Granted it was a little tricky getting it together, but once i did i was very happy with my purchase. Works very well and a steal for the 40 dollars i paid for the product.
customer_reviews.author: aaron b.

customer_reviews.title: Big fan
customer_reviews.text: Saw some bad reviews, but it does the trick just fine. The straps on the back are a little short to connect to the frame of my particular backboard, but that's easily fixable. Other than that, I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic L. Verstegen

customer_reviews.title: Would by recommend
customer_reviews.text: Hard to assemble. Bar too long for netting. Poor overall.
customer_reviews.author: alexa handley

customer_reviews.title: Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the design of this product. Once the assembled silver tube was inserted into the net header, it was too long to insert the net harness into the tube. I was ready to return the product, but my son was able to use a shorter round silver tube from our old net in order for the net harness to fit properly. Overall, the net system works well, and my son likes how wide it is. However, I would not recommend this to others due to the design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Keeps ball in front of the net!
customer_reviews.text: This net works! It keeps the ball in front of the net! We tie it back when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne mom of  2

customer_reviews.title: Works great! You will need sand to fill the sandbags
customer_reviews.text: Works great! You will need sand to fill the sandbags, but we got that at our local hardware store pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Karla K.

customer_reviews.title: Good Solution
customer_reviews.text: Really helped with the ball going down the back yard. It's not wide enough to stop 100% but will stop 50-60% of the pass balls.
customer_reviews.author: Raheem

customer_reviews.title: Technically impossible to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Technically impossible to assemble without modification or other parts which are not included. Look at the instruction. The harness needs to go to the both ends of the metal bar. Look at the metal bar and harness. The harness is a little bit elastic however I could not connect both ends simply the metal bar is too long. You may want to cut off a half inch of this metal bar, however I decided to return this. I will get a full refund, but I think I need to get some compensation for my wasted time, too.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: it's worked great so far and a great price
customer_reviews.text: If you have some muscle you can attach the hooks to the rod. I have no complaints, it's worked great so far and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

product_meta.title: Rolbak Silver Basketball Return Net with 2 Refillable Sand Bags, Webbing Harness, and Nylon Brackets
product_meta.description: Maximize training time and focus on making those winning three-point shots with this high-quality Rolbak basketball backstop net. Featuring netting with high tensile strength, it catches missed shots and safely rolls them back to you which also keeps the ball away from windows, plants, and landscaping. This rollback net system is especially suitable for portable and small in-ground basketball systems and offers simple, no-tools-required attachment. Whats more, this defensive net system is designed with arms and net that easily fold on the main pole for discreet storage. This basketball rebounding equipment also provides full protection from basketball rim to ground - weve got all the bases covered! Basketball hoop sold separately. Shipping is included when you buy from Dazadi plus a 90-day warranty.
feature_bullets: PERFECT FOR YOUR EXISTING BASKETBALL HOOP - The Silver Rolbak return net is ideal for small and portable basketball hoops with 48 to 60 inches wide backboards. (Backboard sold separately)

SPEND LESS TIME CHASING AFTER BASKETBALLS - Save yourself from running after missed shots. Ideal for shooting free throws or jump shooting either solo or with friends. Basketball rebound net: 9 L x 5 W feet.

QUICK AND EASY SET UP - This return basketball net easily attaches to the back of your basketball rim via a webbing harness or to your basketball systems bottom extension arms using nylon brackets. Can also be secured to the ground using two high-quality, refillable sand bags.

DURABLE NETTING AND DISCREET STORAGE - This basketball system accessory has a tough, polyethylene netting that has a thickness of 2.5 millimeters - capable of withstanding forceful hits and long hours of play. This defensive net system is also designed with arms and net that easily fold on the main pole for discreet storage.

WARRANTY - Your product will arrive with all the necessary parts, without defect and/or shipping damage. Well ship new replacement parts or an entire replacement table at no cost. If you still arent satisfied, well give you a full refund. We also offer in-home delivery and assembly for an added fee. During the 90-day limited warranty period, we shall repair or replace defective parts at no cost to the purchaser.
